channel.title: Am i Doing this right
channel.description:
Im Trying 2 setup a moparscape server, ive been following a tutorial. At the moment im trying to set MSDOS 2 run the server, is my script right?
@echo off COLOR 08 title tomsserver Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe" -server pause
oh and the error message in msdos is:
error: cannot Read: *.java

item.title: Am i Doing this right
item.dc:creator: @tom15 tom15
item.description:
@tom15 wrote:

ok a server like moparscape that lets me edit script, add stuff and go on when i want

Read full topic

item.title: Am i Doing this right
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“tom15, post:1, topic:1539”]Im Trying 2 setup a moparscape server, ive been following a tutorial. At the moment im trying to set MSDOS 2 run the server, is my script right?

[quote]@echo off
COLOR 08
title tomsserver Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe” -server
pause[/quote][/quote]

no such thing as a moparscape server

Read full topic
